Name: Dots eXtreme
About the game: Dots eXtreme is a classic dots puzzle with large boards and increased difficulty level. It has simple rules, but challenging gameplay. Connect matching colors and shapes, use bridges and tubes to complete more than 500 handmade puzzles. There are different board sizes available, ranging from 8x8 to 20x20 cells. Lots of levels Boards from simple 8x8 to complex 20x20 Dots, Lines and Bridges Different UI skins to unlock In-game tips which will help you to complete most challenging levels
Meta Title: Dots eXtreme: Sep 13, 2016, Starwind Games and Full Overview
